Class ExchangeEditor

java.lang.Object
eg.edittools.ExchangeEditor
All Implemented Interfaces:
AddableEditTool
public class ExchangeEditor
extends java.lang.Object
implements AddableEditTool
An editor panel to edit and view text in a separate text area
